mapper.select: select t.TEMPLATE_ID TemplateId, t.TEMPLATE_NAME TemplateName from HR_SALARY_TEMPLATE t where t.IS_GLOBAL=1

select t1.ITEM_EIDTABLE Editable,t.ITEM_ID ItemId,t.Parent_ID ParentId, t.ITEM_TITLE ItemCaption,t.ISLEAF from HR_SALARY_TEMPLATE_ITEM t1 inner join HR_SALARY_ITEM t on t.ITEM_ID=t1.ITEM_ID where t1.TEMPLATE_ID=#{value} order by t.ITEM_CODE
select t.PERSON_ID objectId,t.CARD_ID ObjectCode,t.PERSON_NAME ObjectName,t.Service_Fee ServiceFee from HR_EMPLOYEE t where t.COMPANY_ID=#{value} and ISNULL(t.State, 0)=0 and t.UseType=0

select t1.PERSON_ID PersonId,t1.ITEM_ID ItemId,sum(t1.ITEM_VALUE) PayValue from HR_EMPLOYEE t INNER JOIN HR_SALARY_IMPORTOR_DATA t1 on t1.PERSON_ID=t.PERSON_ID where t.COMPANY_ID=${CompanyId} and t1.PAY_MONTH='${PayMonth}' and t.State=0 GROUP BY t1.PERSON_ID,t1.ITEM_ID union select t1.PERSON_ID PersonId,4 ItemId,sum(t1.ITEM_CMP_VALUE) PayValue from HR_EMPLOYEE t INNER JOIN HR_SALARY_IMPORTOR_DATA t1 on t1.PERSON_ID=t.PERSON_ID where t.COMPANY_ID=${CompanyId} and t1.PAY_MONTH='${PayMonth}' and t1.ITEM_ID in (201,202,203,204,205) and t.State=0 GROUP BY t1.PERSON_ID union select t1.PERSON_ID PersonId,5 ItemId,sum(t1.ITEM_CMP_VALUE) PayValue from HR_EMPLOYEE t INNER JOIN HR_SALARY_IMPORTOR_DATA t1 on t1.PERSON_ID=t.PERSON_ID where t.COMPANY_ID=${CompanyId} and t1.PAY_MONTH='${PayMonth}' and t1.ITEM_ID in (206) and t.State=0 GROUP BY t1.PERSON_ID

select t1.ITEM_EIDTABLE Editable,t.ITEM_ID ItemId,t.Parent_ID ParentId, t.ITEM_TITLE ItemCaption,t.ISLEAF from HR_SALARY_PAY_ITEM t1 inner join HR_SALARY_ITEM t on t.ITEM_ID=t1.ITEM_ID where t1.PAY_ID=#{value} order by t.ITEM_CODE

select t.PERSON_ID objectId,t.CARD_ID ObjectCode,t.PERSON_NAME ObjectName,t.CARD_ID CardID,p.POSITION_NAME Position from HR_EMPLOYEE t inner join HR_SALARY_PAY_OBJECT t1 on t1.PERSON_ID=t.PERSON_ID left join HR_POSITION p on p.POSITION_ID=t.POSITION_ID where t1.PAY_ID=#{value} order by t.PERSON_ID
mapper.delete: delete from HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE where PAY_ID=#{PayId} and ITEM_ID=#{ItemId};
mapper.update: update HR_SALARY_PAY set PAY_TITLE=#{PayTitle} where PAY_ID=#{PayId};
update HR_SALARY_PAY set STATUS=#{Status} where PAY_ID=#{PayId};
mapper.select: select e.PERSON_NAME,e.CARD_ID,e.BANK_CARD, sum(f101) f101,sum(f102) f102,sum(f103) f103,sum(f104) f104,sum(f105) f105,sum(f106) f106, sum(f107) f107,sum(f108) f108,sum(f109) f109,sum(f110) f110,sum(f111) f111,sum(f207) f207 from ( select t.PERSON_ID, case t.ITEM_ID when 101 then t.item_value else 0 END f101, case t.ITEM_ID when 102 then t.item_value else 0 END f102, case t.ITEM_ID when 103 then t.item_value else 0 END f103, case t.ITEM_ID when 104 then t.item_value else 0 END f104, case t.ITEM_ID when 105 then t.item_value else 0 END f105, case t.ITEM_ID when 106 then t.item_value else 0 END f106, case t.ITEM_ID when 107 then t.item_value else 0 END f107, case t.ITEM_ID when 108 then t.item_value else 0 END f108, case t.ITEM_ID when 109 then t.item_value else 0 END f109, case t.ITEM_ID when 110 then t.item_value else 0 END f110, case t.ITEM_ID when 111 then t.item_value else 0 END f111, case t.ITEM_ID when 207 then t.item_value else 0 END f207 from HR_SALARY_IMPORTOR_DATA t where t.IMPORT_ID=#{value} ) v INNER JOIN HR_EMPLOYEE e on e.PERSON_ID=v.PERSON_ID group by e.PERSON_NAME,v.PERSON_ID,e.CARD_ID,e.BANK_CARD order by e.PERSON_NAME
